      static String DEFAULT_METADATA_INDEX_CACHE_POLICY 
      static String METADATA_INDEX_CACHE_POLICY
      Option selects the policy that will be used to cache PartitionLocators from an IMetadataIndex on the client.

      • METADATA_INDEX_CACHE_POLICY

        static final String METADATA_INDEX_CACHE_POLICY
        Option selects the policy that will be used to cache PartitionLocators from an IMetadataIndex on the client. Warning: This feature is expected to evolve.
